Key Match Events: The Yankees finished off the Guardians with a 5-2 victory in Game 5 of the ALCS to get their captain to his long-awaited first World Series.
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge had not forgotten the motivating heartbreak that he experienced seven years ago, falling one win short of reaching the World Series as a rookie in 2017.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge had not forgotten the motivating heartbreak that he experienced seven years ago, falling one win short of reaching the World Series as a rookie in 2017.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees have four more games to win against either the Mets or Dodgers.
Others: Giancarlo Stanton hit four home runs en route to ALCS MVP, and Juan Soto, whose tiebreaking three-run 10th-inning home run all but clinched the Yankeesâ€™ first pennant since 2009.
